mapper.update:
update `contact`
initiator_id=#{contact.initiatorId},
accepter_id=#{contact.accepterId},
status=#{contact.status},
contact_type=#{contact.contactType},
create_time=#{contact.createTime},
last_update_time=#{contact.lastUpdateTime},
where initiator_id=#{initiatorId} and accepter_id=#{accepterId};
mapper.delete: delete from `contact` where initiator_id=#{initiatorId} and accepter_id=#{accepterId};
mapper.select: select * from `contact` where initiator_id=#{initiatorId} and accepter_id=#{accepterId};

select c.initiator_id, c.accepter_id, c.`status`, c.create_time, u.id, u.email, u.nickname, u.sex, u.area, u.personal_signature, u.`status` userStatus from contact c inner join `user` u on c.accepter_id=u.id where initiator_id=#{initiatorId} and contact_type=0;

select c.initiator_id, c.accepter_id, c.`status`, c.create_time, u.id, u.email, u.nickname, u.sex, u.area, u.personal_signature, u.`status` userStatus from contact c inner join `user` u on c.initiator_id=u.id where accepter_id=#{accepterId} and contact_type=0;

select c.initiator_id, c.accepter_id, c.`status`, c.create_time, g.id, g.nickname, g.owner_id, g.notice, g.`status` groupStatus, g.authority, g.create_time groupCreateTime from contact c inner join `group` g on c.accepter_id=g.id where initiator_id=#{initiatorId} and contact_type=1;

select c.initiator_id, c.accepter_id, c.`status`, c.create_time, g.id, g.nickname, g.owner_id, g.notice, g.`status` groupStatus, g.authority, g.create_time groupCreateTime from contact c inner join `group` g on c.initiator_id=g.id where accepter_id=#{accepterId} and contact_type=1;
